result.eng: The language they spoke was Irish and not English.
result.ga: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siad
result.orig: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siad
result.html: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siadThe language they spoke was Irish and not English.
result.ponchtml: Ba í Gaeilge seaċas Béarla an teanga a laḃair siadThe language they spoke was Irish and not English.

result.eng: They were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ga: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.orig: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.html: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an Ġaeilge á húsáid acu mar ṫeanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.

result.eng: The Irish language always has prirority.
result.ga: Bíonn tús áite ag an Ghaeilge i gcónaí
result.orig: Bíonn tús áite ag an Ghaeilge i gcónaí
result.html: Bíonn tús áite ag an Ghaeilge i gcónaíThe Irish language always has prirority.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn tús áite ag an Ġaeilge i gcónaíThe Irish language always has prirority.

result.eng: The Irish language is intertwined with the history of the country.
result.ga: Tá an Ghaeilge fite fuaite i stair na tíre
result.orig: Tá an Ghaeilge fite fuaite i stair na tíre
result.html: Tá an Ghaeilge fite fuaite i stair na tíreThe Irish language is intertwined with the history of the country.
result.ponchtml: Tá an Ġaeilge fite fuaite i stair na tíreThe Irish language is intertwined with the history of the country.

result.eng: A country without language is a country without soul.
result.ga: Tír gan teanga tír gan anam
result.orig: Tír gan teanga tír gan anam
result.html: Tír gan teanga tír gan anamA country without language is a country without soul.
result.ponchtml: Tír gan teanga tír gan anamA country without language is a country without soul.

result.eng: Irish language news is available on the radio.
result.ga: Bíonn nuacht as Gaeilge le fáil ar an raidió
result.orig: Bíonn nuacht as Gaeilge le fáil ar an raidió
result.html: Bíonn nuacht as Gaeilge le fáil ar an raidióIrish language news is available on the radio.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn nuaċt as Gaeilge le fáil ar an raidióIrish language news is available on the radio.
